This helps us out by:
- Allowing you to inspect where the boys may eventually spend the night
- Letting you mock and criticize my taste in my "man decor" furnishings
- Permitting me to cook for someone for the first time in six long months

- Perhaps kindling a blueprint for the way the kids could see us in the future
- Ending the catch 22 where we can't see each other ... because we don't now
I already know you have reservations (with me on Wed.. lol ) But I am asking you to be brave, take a chance, and let me show you I am the husband
you can trust and who has listened and applied your feedback. If I can't show you, we will be stuck here forever.
This doesn't violate our RO and could show us a future of cooperation and friendship.
Please, I am not trying to manipulate you, I'm trying to build a bridge. Please allow me.
Your Wed night chef and confidant in all things Moyer Kids
